words.source: H559 (אָמַר, 'to say'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'Then said', ESV 'Then said', NASB 'Then said' — all agree
H269 (אָחוֹת, 'sister'), HNcfsc/Sp3ms (noun-common-feminine-singular-construct/suffix-3ms); KJV 'his sister', ESV 'his sister', NASB 'his sister' — all agree
H1323 (בַּת, 'daughter'), HNcfsc (noun-common-feminine-singular-construct); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Pharaoh's daughter'
H3212 (הָלַךְ, 'to go/walk'), HTi/Vqi1cs (interrogative-he/Qal-imperfect-1cs); KJV 'Shall I go', ESV 'Shall I go', NASB 'Shall I go' — all agree
H7121 (קָרָא, 'to call'), HC/Vqq1cs (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-1cs [with waw-consecutive = future sense]); KJV 'and call', ESV 'and call', NASB 'and call' — all agree
Preposition lamed + suffix 2fs, HR/Sp2fs; KJV 'to thee', ESV 'for you', NASB 'for you' — all agree
H802 (אִשָּׁה, 'woman'), HNcfsa (noun-common-feminine-singular-absolute); KJV 'a nurse', ESV 'a woman', NASB 'a woman' — ESV/NASB keep 'woman' with 'nurse' as modifier
H3243 (יָנַק, 'to suck/nurse'), HNcfsa (noun-common-feminine-singular-absolute, participle used as noun); KJV 'a nurse', ESV 'a nursing woman', NASB 'a nursing woman' — all agree
H4480 (מִן, 'from/out of'), HR (preposition); KJV 'of', ESV 'from', NASB 'from' — all agree
H5680 (עִבְרִי, 'Hebrew'), HTd/Ngfpa (article/gentilic-feminine-plural-absolute); KJV 'the Hebrew women', ESV 'the Hebrew women', NASB 'the Hebrew women' — all agree
H3243 (יָנַק, 'to suck/nurse'), HC/Vhi3fs (conjunctive/Hiphil-imperfect-3fs); KJV 'nurse', ESV 'nurse', NASB 'nurse' — all agree
Preposition lamed + suffix 2fs, HR/Sp2fs; KJV 'for thee', ESV 'for you', NASB 'for you' — all agree
H3206 (יֶלֶד, 'child/boy'), HTd/Ncmsa (article/noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'the child', ESV 'the child', NASB 'the child' — all agree
